A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
While not perfect (there is one particular storyline that drags down the 2 main storylines)\, The Last Jedi delivers on emotional storytelling\, compelling themes\, and unexpected developments. 

It featured some of the best and most original action pieces in the Star Wars canon. The acting (particularly from Mark Hamilton\, Carrie Fisher\, Adam Driver\, and Daisy Ridley) was impeccable. Emotionally\, it struck a great balance between moments of humour\, triumph\, and sadness. 

I look forward to seeing where the story goes from here.
